headline.main: GUADALCANAL UNIT KILLS 9 JAPANESE; Patrol Trying to Escape Is First Seen on Island Since Victory Last February 4 SOLOMONS RAIDS MADE Gatere and Pepeli on Island of Kolombangara Listed as Targets for the First Time

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 30 -- The first Japanese to be discovered on Guadalcanal since American marines and soldiers consolidated their occupation of that island last February were "intercepted and wiped out" by United States troops three days ago, the Navy Department revealed in a communique today.
abstract: planes raid Jap strongholds, Gatere and Pelpeli, Kolombangara, Munda and Kahili
